2025-01-23T00:00:00-07:00: Atlanta Braves: Signed free agent CL Jared Hughes to a 1-year contract worth a total of $7,000,000.
New York Mets: Signed free agent SP Matt Harvey to a 3-year contract worth a total of $16,500,000.
San Francisco Giants: Signed free agent C Wilson Garcia to a 4-year contract worth a total of $19,960,000.
2025-01-25T00:00:00-07:00: Houston Astros: Signed free agent SP Sonny Gray to a 3-year contract worth a total of $37,000,000.
2025-01-27T00:00:00-07:00: The Tampa Bay Rays traded 24-year-old minor league starting pitcher José Martínez and 18-year-old minor league starting pitcher Gerjan Baars to the Milwaukee Brewers, getting 18-year-old minor league center fielder José Robles and 18-year-old minor league center fielder Jesús López in return.
